Paws & Claws

Adopt & Shop

Our friendly neighborhood pet store has adoptable pets ranging from guinea pigs, reptiles & fish to kittens, puppies & rabbits. For more than 25 years, we have matched abandoned & surrendered animals with safe & loving caregivers, and we strive to ensure every pet we care for is loved and given the attention they deserve. If you're looking to adopt a pet, there's no better choice than Animal House. We're the pet store with a heart and a conscience..
